biotools.summary: predicting isoform functions from sequences and expression profiles via deep learning | Deep learning based prediction of IsoForm FUnctions from Sequences and Expression | DIFFUSE is a deep learning based method for predicting isoform functions by integrating the data of isoform sequences, domains and expression profiles.
